name.jp: パーティー成長の巻物

description.en: Your Party Level is set to Level 40 as soon as you use this scroll. Your Party Points will be set to 400 as well. Note that you will lose Party Points if they are higher than 400 prior to using this scroll.
description.ar: Your Party Level is set to Level 40 as soon as you use this scroll. Your Party Points will be set to 400 as well. Note that you will lose Party Points if they are higher than 400 prior to using this scroll.
description.br: O Nível do seu Grupo é definido para 40 com 400 Pontos de Grupo assim que utilizar esse pergaminho. Note que seu grupo perderá pontos caso eles forem maiores que 400 antes de usar este pergaminho.
description.cns: 使用此卷轴后，你的剧团等级将升级到 40 级。 你的剧团技能点将被设置为400点。 请注意，如果在使用此卷轴之前剧团技能点超过 400点，你将失去之前的这些剧团技能点。
description.de: Sobald du die Scroll benutzt, wird das Level deiner Party auf 40 angehoben und du erhältst Party Punkte.
description.fi: Your Party Level is set to Level 40 as soon as you use this scroll. Your Party Points will be set to 400 as well. Note that you will lose Party Points if they are higher than 400 prior to using this scroll.
description.fil: Your Party Level is set to Level 40 as soon as you use this scroll. Your Party Points will be set to 400 as well. Note that you will lose Party Points if they are higher than 400 prior to using this scroll.
description.fr: Parchemin faisant automatiquement évoluer le groupe au niveau 40. Les points du groupe seront fixés à 400.
description.id: Level Party-mu diatur ke Level 40 segera setelah kamu menggunakan scroll ini. Poin Party Anda juga akan diatur ke 400. Perhatikan bahwa Anda akan kehilangan Poin Party jika poin tersebut lebih tinggi dari 400 sebelum menggunakan scroll ini.
description.it: Your Party Level is set to Level 40 as soon as you use this scroll. Your Party Points will be set to 400 as well. Note that you will lose Party Points if they are higher than 400 prior to using this scroll.
description.jp: 使用するとパーティーレベルを40まで上昇し、さらにパーティーポイントも一定量配布されます。
description.kr: 사용시 극단의 레벨을 40으로 성장시켜줌과 동시에 극단 포인트도 400으로 설정됩니다. 이 스크롤을 사용하기 전에 극단 포인트가 400 이상일 경우 극단 포인트가 손실됩니다.
description.nl: Your Party Level is set to Level 40 as soon as you use this scroll. Your Party Points will be set to 400 as well. Note that you will lose Party Points if they are higher than 400 prior to using this scroll.
description.pl: Your Party Level is set to Level 40 as soon as you use this scroll. Your Party Points will be set to 400 as well. Note that you will lose Party Points if they are higher than 400 prior to using this scroll.
description.ru: После применения повышает уровень труппы до 40 и устанавливает очки труппы в 400.
description.sp: El Nivel de Party se establece al 40 en cuanto usas este pergamino. Los Puntos de Party se establecen en 400 de la misma manera. Ten en cuenta que perderás Puntos de Party si antes de usar el pergamino había más de 400.
description.sw: Your Party Level is set to Level 40 as soon as you use this scroll. Your Party Points will be set to 400 as well. Note that you will lose Party Points if they are higher than 400 prior to using this scroll.
description.th: เลเวลปาร์ตี้ของคุณถูกตั้งไว้ที่เลเวล 40 ทันทีที่คุณใช้ม้วนนี้ คะแนนปาร์ตี้ของคุณจะถูกตั้งค่าเป็น 400 เช่นกัน โปรดทราบว่าคุณจะสูญเสียคะแนนปาร์ตี้หากมีมากกว่า 400 ก่อนใช้ม้วนนี้
description.tw: 使用後立即提升劇團等級至40級，並發放400點劇團點數，若使用前已獲得400點劇團點數，將不會給予超過的點數。
description.vi: Cấp độ nhóm của bạn được đặt thành Cấp độ 40 ngay sau khi bạn sử dụng cuộn này. Điểm nhóm của bạn cũng sẽ được 400. Lưu ý rằng bạn sẽ mất Điểm nhóm nếu chúng cao hơn 400 trước khi sử dụng cuộn này.
